process.name: Test Queue Get Items
process.narrative: Tests the getting of work items on which various actions have been performed

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to be created

input.name: Key Field
input.narrative: The key column to use in the collection which makes up a queue item

input.name: Max Attempts
input.narrative: The maximum number of retry attempts for the queue. Default: 5

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Data
input.narrative: A collection containing the data, one row for each item to be added

input.name: Defer Until
input.narrative: Optionally, the date/time the new item(s) should be deferred until

input.name: Priority
input.narrative: Optionally, the priority for the new item(s). Lower numbers represent higher priorities. The default is 0.

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: Optionally, a semi-colon-separated set of tags to apply to the queue item(s)

input.name: Status
input.narrative: Optionally, the initial status required of the work queue item(s)

output.name: Item IDs
output.narrative: The IDs of the items which have been added to the queue, in the order of the collection of data passed that was input

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Data
input.narrative: A collection containing the data, one row for each item to be added

input.name: Defer Until
input.narrative: Optionally, the date/time the new item(s) should be deferred until

input.name: Priority
input.narrative: Optionally, the priority for the new item(s). Lower numbers represent higher priorities. The default is 0.

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: Optionally, a semi-colon-separated set of tags to apply to the queue item(s)

input.name: Status
input.narrative: Optionally, the initial status required of the work queue item(s)

output.name: Item IDs
output.narrative: The IDs of the items which have been added to the queue, in the order of the collection of data passed that was input

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: The tags to work

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: The tags to work

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Key Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a key value to filter by. Only items with this key value will be considered.

input.name: Tag Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a tag mask to filter by. The tag should be in the format : ."+wanted tag; -unwanted tag ; other wanted tag".

output.name: Item ID
output.narrative: The ID of the item retrieved - empty if there are none available.

output.name: Data
output.narrative: The data associated with the item - a single collection row.

output.name: Status
output.narrative: The status of the item.

output.name: Attempts
output.narrative: The number of attempts already made to work this item.

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the item to mark

input.name: Exception Reason
input.narrative: A description of the reason for the exception

input.name: Retry
input.narrative: Whether or not to retry the item, up to the maximum number of attempts specified for the queue. Optional - if not specified, the item will be retried

input.name: Keep Locked
input.narrative: Whether or not the clone of the item should remain locked after the exception has been registered and the item is retried. Optional - default is False

output.name: New Item ID
output.narrative: The Item ID of the newly cloned item. This item will be locked if 'Keep Locked' is True. This will be empty if no item was cloned (ie. the item was not retried.

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the item to mark

exception.detail: "It can never happen, really, unless something's *really* b0rked"

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Data
input.narrative: A collection containing the data, one row for each item to be added

input.name: Defer Until
input.narrative: Optionally, the date/time the new item(s) should be deferred until

input.name: Priority
input.narrative: Optionally, the priority for the new item(s). Lower numbers represent higher priorities. The default is 0.

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: Optionally, a semi-colon-separated set of tags to apply to the queue item(s)

input.name: Status
input.narrative: Optionally, the initial status required of the work queue item(s)

output.name: Item IDs
output.narrative: The IDs of the items which have been added to the queue, in the order of the collection of data passed that was input

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: The tags to work

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: The tags to work

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name of the check

input.name: Key
input.narrative: The key value to filter on

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: The tags to search

input.name: Expected Completion Count
input.narrative: The expected number of completions

input.name: Expected Exception Count
input.narrative: The expected number of exceptions

input.name: Expected Pending Count
input.narrative: The expected number of pending items

input.name: Expected Locked Count
input.narrative: The expected number of locked items

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to retrieve the completed items from

input.name: Start Date
input.narrative: The start date from which any items marked as complete should be returned. Optional - No date indicates no start date threshold

input.name: End Date
input.narrative: The end date up to which any items marked as complete should be returned. Optional - No date indicates no end date threshold

input.name: Key Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a key value to filter by. Only items with this key value will be considered.

input.name: Tag Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a tag mask to filter by. The tag should be in the format : ."+wanted tag; -unwanted tag ; other wanted tag".

input.name: Maximum Rows
input.narrative: The maximum number of rows to return. Optional - No value indicates that all rows should be returned

output.name: Completed Items
output.narrative: The items which were marked as complete within the given date range, up to the maximum count if one was given

field.name: Item ID
field.description: The Item ID of the work queue item

field.name: Item ID
field.description: The Item ID of the work queue item

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to retrieve the exception items from

input.name: Start Date
input.narrative: Optionally, the start threshold date. Any items returned will have been marked as an exception after this date. If no value is given, there will be no start threshold.

input.name: End Date
input.narrative: Optionally, the end threshold date. Any items returned will have been marked as an exception before this date. If no value is given, there will be no end threshold.

input.name: Key Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a key value to filter by. Only items with this key value will be considered.

input.name: Tag Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a tag mask to filter by. The tag should be in the format : ."+wanted tag; -unwanted tag ; other wanted tag".

input.name: Maximum Rows
input.narrative: Optionally, the maximum number of rows to return. No value indicates that all rows should be returned

output.name: Exception Items
output.narrative: The items which were marked with an exception within the given date range, up to the maximum count if one was given

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection whose rows are to be counted

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection whose rows are to be counted

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

exception.detail: "The exception count for " & [Name] & " (using key: ""'" & [Key] & "'"" & tags: """ & [Tags] & """) was supposed to be: " & [Expected Exception Count] & ", but it was actually: " & [Exception Count]

"The completed count for " & [Name] & " (using key: ""'" & [Key] & "'"" & tags: """ & [Tags] & """) was supposed to be: " & [Expected Completion Count] & ", but it was actually: " & [Completion Count]

input.name: Expected Locked Count
input.narrative: The expected number of locked items

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to delete items from

input.name: Date Threshold
input.narrative: The threshold date. Items completed or marked with an exception before this date will be deleted from the queue - if not given, all processed items in the specified queue will be deleted.

output.name: Deletion Count
output.narrative: Indicates the number of items which were deleted (which may legitimately be zero).

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Data
input.narrative: A collection containing the data, one row for each item to be added

input.name: Defer Until
input.narrative: Optionally, the date/time the new item(s) should be deferred until

input.name: Priority
input.narrative: Optionally, the priority for the new item(s). Lower numbers represent higher priorities. The default is 0.

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: Optionally, a semi-colon-separated set of tags to apply to the queue item(s)

input.name: Status
input.narrative: Optionally, the initial status required of the work queue item(s)

output.name: Item IDs
output.narrative: The IDs of the items which have been added to the queue, in the order of the collection of data passed that was input

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Data
input.narrative: A collection containing the data, one row for each item to be added

input.name: Defer Until
input.narrative: Optionally, the date/time the new item(s) should be deferred until

input.name: Priority
input.narrative: Optionally, the priority for the new item(s). Lower numbers represent higher priorities. The default is 0.

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: Optionally, a semi-colon-separated set of tags to apply to the queue item(s)

input.name: Status
input.narrative: Optionally, the initial status required of the work queue item(s)

output.name: Item IDs
output.narrative: The IDs of the items which have been added to the queue, in the order of the collection of data passed that was input

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue for which the locked items are required

input.name: Key Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a key value to filter by. Only items with this key value will be considered.

input.name: Tag Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a tag mask to filter by. The tag should be in the format : ."+wanted tag; -unwanted tag ; other wanted tag".

input.name: Maximum
input.narrative: Optionally, the maximum number of items to return. Default is to return all items

input.name: Skip
input.narrative: Optionally, the number of items to skip before returning. Default is zero, ie. return all items from the head of the queue

output.name: Pending Items
output.narrative: The currently pending items in the queue, referenced by ID. The single column is 'Item ID' : text. The elements in the collection will be in the order in which they will be loaded by the 'Get Next Item' action.

field.name: Item ID
field.description: The Item ID of the work queue item

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue for which the locked items are required

input.name: Key Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a key value to filter by. Only items with this key value will be considered.

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: Optionally, the semi-colon separated tags to filter the locked items with. Empty implies that all locked items in the queue should be returned

output.name: Locked Items
output.narrative: The currently locked items in the queue. Columns are 'Item ID' : text, and 'Locked' : datetime. The elements in the collection will be in locked date/time order

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection whose rows are to be counted

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection whose rows are to be counted

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

field.name: Item ID
field.description: The Item ID of the work queue item

field.name: Locked
field.description: The date/time when the item was locked

exception.detail: "The pending count for " & [Name] & " (using key: ""'" & [Key] & "'"" & tags: """ & [Tags] & """) was supposed to be: " & [Expected Pending Count] & ", but it was actually: " & [Pending Count]
"The locked count for " & [Name] & " (using key: ""'" & [Key] & "'"" & tags: """ & [Tags] & """) was supposed to be: " & [Expected Locked Count] & ", but it was actually: " & [Locked Count]

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Key Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a key value to filter by. Only items with this key value will be considered.

input.name: Tag Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a tag mask to filter by. The tag should be in the format : ."+wanted tag; -unwanted tag ; other wanted tag".

output.name: Item ID
output.narrative: The ID of the item retrieved - empty if there are none available.

output.name: Data
output.narrative: The data associated with the item - a single collection row.

output.name: Status
output.narrative: The status of the item.

output.name: Attempts
output.narrative: The number of attempts already made to work this item.

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the item to mark

input.name: Exception Reason
input.narrative: A description of the reason for the exception

input.name: Retry
input.narrative: Whether or not to retry the item, up to the maximum number of attempts specified for the queue. Optional - if not specified, the item will be retried

input.name: Keep Locked
input.narrative: Whether or not the clone of the item should remain locked after the exception has been registered and the item is retried. Optional - default is False

output.name: New Item ID
output.narrative: The Item ID of the newly cloned item. This item will be locked if 'Keep Locked' is True. This will be empty if no item was cloned (ie. the item was not retried.
